name: Purgatory Guardian
description:
INTRODUCTION


Welcome to your after life and become the Purgatory Guardian. The savior of souls wondering this world. The Purgatory, a realm between life and death destined for Heaven’s nominated, is now corrupted forever by sins. You are the only one who can defeat the Hell’s damnation and protect the divines.

The Purgatory Guardian is a semi-open world action role-playing first person shooter. The story occurs in an alternate version of Purgatory ​(Described by Dante's inferno) where all the characters involved are from different times in history.

As a guardian in this world, you'll have many responsibilities. You'll take on quests to help the inhabitants. Travel deep into the land and Meet historical characters who have shaped the world and it’s afterlife. This world filled with riches, lost secrets, mythical creatures.


GREATER CHALLENGES BRING GREATER REWARDS


Fight stronger forgotten gods and creatures dwelling this world and feeding on his inhabitants. Acquire new gears, level up your character, and become the most powerful guardian of the souls. Enhance your character’s abilities with powerful abilities, each with access to various “Gifts” that can increase your strength, speed, and can allow you to utilize new weapon abilities or access overpowered attacks. Finish off the demons and leave them to bleed so others know how strong you've become.


RISE TOGETHER


Co-op and venture out into a world of destruction with harder missions waiting for your call. Use your combined strength to overcome destiny and fight of much stronger demons and gods in special side quests that will be available once you get to this point in the campaign story.

Features:
  • Immersive Story
  • Defend the Last City of humanity in the afterlife
  • Evolve to the ultimate guardian fighter
  • Follow various paths and religions
  • Side Co-op missions or dare to try alone
  • Check your facts. most of the items and characters will have real info codex
  • Replay special missions to farm resources to enhence your character and arsenal
  • Collect an amazing array of weapons and armor to personalize your combat style


DEMO


Our upcoming free demo will contain a short campaign stage level
and another side quest. The guardians task will have you to go to some of the same location again to keep the peace
